H0.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Mouse

H1.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Shrew

H2.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Hedgehog

H3.text: The bumblebee or hog-nosed is the smallest mammal in the world - what is it. Bat

A4.text: Kitti's hog-nosed bat is the smallest species of bat and arguably the world's smallest mammal by body length

A5.text: The main competitors for the title are small shrews; in particular, the Etruscan shrew may be lighter at 1.2 to 2.7 g (0.042 to 0.095 oz) but its body is longer, measuring 36 to 53 mm (1.4 to 2.1 in) from its head to the base of the tail
